<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=24%2BHour%252B%2BStream%2B%2521songrequest%2Boperational%252C%2BAll%2Bsystems%2Bactive&channel=darkpython&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&archive_id=534022960"></object></p>

<p><a href="http://www.twitch.tv/darkpython"><strong>Darkpython</strong></a> recently hosted a 24-hour <em>KSP</em> marathon stream on his Twitch channel. Starting at hour 20, the zaniness has set in and unfortunate things start happening to everything he touches. Bad for him, entertaining for us!</p>

<p>Warning - this video contains mature language.</p>

Edited June 6, 2014 by Rowsdower
